text: seongseoui jisig-i pungbuhan jaga malhagil dangsin-i nunkkamjjag hal saie geugeos-eul gajyeoogessseubnida balo geuttaesollomon-eun geugeos-i jagigyeot-e iss-eum-eulbogoseo malhagil igeos-eun nae junim-ui eunhyelosseo ineun naega gamsahago iss neunji eunhyeleul mang-gaghago issneunji si heomhalyeo hasim-ila nugudeun gamsahaneunjaneun jasin-ui yeonghon-e gamsahaneun ja imyeo eunhyeleul mang-gaghaneun janeun hana nim-ui eunhyeleul geoyeoghaneun jaigeoneul sillo naui junim-eun pung-yowa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
